price: Biz ondan sonra, onun kavmini helak etmek için üzerlerine gökten herhangi bir ordu indirmedik ve indirecek de değildik.
arabic: ۞ وَمَآ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ مِن جُندٖ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنزِلِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā anzalnā ʿalā qawmihi min baʿdihi min jundin mina al-samāi wamā kunnā munzilīna
